${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Shove.NAME: Shove
${modID}:Shove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove !M! Strength from enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DeusExMachina.NAME: Deus Ex Machina
${modID}:DeusExMachina.DESCRIPTION: Exalted: Add 6 Blasts into your hand. NL Deal !D! x 12 damage.

${modID}:Scapegoat.NAME: Scapegoat
${modID}:Scapegoat.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain 1 Buffer. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SteadyAim.NAME: Steady Aim
${modID}:SteadyAim.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Steady. NL Lose 2 Dexterity temporarily.

${modID}:CombatRoll.NAME: Combat Roll
${modID}:CombatRoll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 2 Blasts to your hand.

${modID}:Backdash.NAME: Backdash
${modID}:Backdash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity this turn. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:PistolWhip.NAME: Pistol Whip
${modID}:PistolWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add Blast to your hand.

${modID}:GreaterSplitHorizontal.NAME: Great Split: Horizontal
${modID}:GreaterSplitHorizontal.DESCRIPTION: WARNING! ONLY USE IN EMERGENCIES. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:OTG.NAME: OTG
${modID}:OTG.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, restore 1 Energy.

${modID}:BackupMagazine.NAME: Backup Magazine
${modID}:BackupMagazine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! Blast to your hand.

${modID}:EvokedSteel.NAME: Evoked Steel
${modID}:EvokedSteel.DESCRIPTION: Discard all cards. NL Gain Vigor equal to cards discarded. NL Add *Railpiercer into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:EvokedSteel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all cards. NL Gain Vigor equal to cards discarded. NL Add *Railpiercer+ into your hand. NL Gain Vigor equal to cards discarded. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Grudge.NAME: Grudge
${modID}:Grudge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ${modID}:Cursed cannot go below !M! stacks.

${modID}:HexNails.NAME: Hex Nails
${modID}:HexNails.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x 3 damage. NL Apply !M! x 3 ${modID}:Cursed.

${modID}:CatalystPrimers.NAME: Catalyst Primers
${modID}:CatalystPrimers.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is exhausted in combat, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:SplitShot.NAME: Split Shot
${modID}:SplitShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 2 times.

${modID}:GoForBullseye.NAME: Go for Bullseye
${modID}:GoForBullseye.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Frail. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Blast+ into your hand.

${modID}:Static.NAME: Static
${modID}:Static.DESCRIPTION: Thunder. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

${modID}:Swirl.NAME: Swirl
${modID}:Swirl.DESCRIPTION: Wind. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Tides.NAME: Tides
${modID}:Tides.DESCRIPTION: Water. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Gathering Shores.

${modID}:Torrent.NAME: Torrent
${modID}:Torrent.DESCRIPTION: Water. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Erosion.

${modID}:PsychBurst.NAME: Psych Burst
${modID}:PsychBurst.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:DeflectShield.NAME: Deflect Shield
${modID}:DeflectShield.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL If you do not have Block after playing this card, Exhaust 1 card.

${modID}:DivergentFist.NAME: Divergent Fist
${modID}:DivergentFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this does *no *unblocked *damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Cursed.

${modID}:CursedBarrier.NAME: Cursed Barrier
${modID}:CursedBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Self-Spreading Curse.

${modID}:DawnOfRevival.NAME: Dawn of Revival
${modID}:DawnOfRevival.DESCRIPTION: Everyone gains 5 Vulnerable and Weak. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
